Class JobTracker

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      JobTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class JobTracker
extends java.lang.Thread

Job tracker that connects the bridge between incoming user jobs and the worker pool. It proactively looks for clients submitting jobs. When it finds a new job, it takes the necessary steps needed to allow the worker pool to get cracking. If more than one instances are being run (doesn't matter on which node) only one of them works as the primary, all others being backup. If primary fails the new primary takes over from where the previous one left off

Author:
Hasan Imam
